attributes.action: institute Mervyn Allister King as the next Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the recent time of crisis, Mr King has shown extraordinary prudence. In order for our Nation to survive and be competitive in the face of great challenges we need strong and rigorous guidance.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
